summary: Slip, Sach and the gang get mixed up in political intrigue when they try to help an exiled European king and his daughter regain the throne that is rightfully theirs.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Bernard Gorcey|Leon Askin|Sig Ruman|Veola Vonn|Lisa Davis|David Gorcey|Benny Bartlett|Richard Benedict|Frank Richards|Linda Bennett|John Bleifer|Paul Burke|Mel Welles
title: Spy Chasers
